verses.text: Also I in the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w* the \w Mede|strong="H4075"\w*, \add even\add* I, \w stood|strong="H5977"\w* to \w confirm|strong="H2388"\w* and to \w strengthen|strong="H4581"\w* him.

And now will I \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* thee the \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*. Behold, there shall stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w* yet \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*; and the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* shall be \w far|strong="H6239"\w* \w richer|strong="H6238"\w* than \add they\add* \w all|strong="H1419"\w*: and by his \w strength|strong="H2393"\w* through his \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* he shall stir \w up|strong="H5782"\w* all against the \w realm|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Grecia|strong="H3120"\w*.

And a \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w*, that shall \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* with \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w dominion|strong="H4474"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to his \w will|strong="H7522"\w*.

And when he shall stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w*, his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* shall be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, and shall be \w divided|strong="H2673"\w* toward the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w winds|strong="H7307"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; and not to his \w posterity|strong="H0319"\w*, nor according to his \w dominion|strong="H4915"\w* which he \w ruled|strong="H4910"\w*: for his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* shall be plucked \w up|strong="H5428"\w*, even for \w others|strong="H0312"\w* beside those.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* shall be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, and \add one\add* of his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*; and he shall be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* above him, and have \w dominion|strong="H4910"\w*; his \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w dominion|strong="H4474"\w*.

And in the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of \w years|strong="H8141"\w* they shall join themselves \w together|strong="H2266"\w*; for the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* an \w agreement|strong="H4339"\w*: but she shall not \w retain|strong="H6113"\w* the \w power|strong="H3581"\w* of the \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*; neither shall he \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, nor his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*: but she shall be given \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, and they that \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* her, and he that \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* her, and he that \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* her in \add these\add* \w times|strong="H6256"\w*.\f + \fr 11.6 \ft join…: Heb. associate themselves\f*\f + \fr 11.6 \ft an…: Heb. rights\f*\f + \fr 11.6 \ft he that begat…: or, whom she brought forth\f*

But out of a \w branch|strong="H5342"\w* of her \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* shall \add one\add* stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w* in his \w estate|strong="H3653"\w*, which shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* with an \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, and shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w fortress|strong="H4581"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and shall \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* against them, and shall \w prevail|strong="H2388"\w*:\f + \fr 11.7 \ft in…: or, in his place, or, office\f*

And shall also \w carry|strong="H0935"\w* \w captives|strong="H7628"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, with their \w princes|strong="H5257"\w*, \add and\add* with their \w precious|strong="H2532"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*; and he shall \w continue|strong="H5975"\w* \add more\add* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* than the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*.\f + \fr 11.8 \ft their precious…: Heb. vessels of their desire\f*

So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into \add his\add* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, and shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* into his own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.

But his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall be stirred \w up|strong="H1624"\w*, and shall \w assemble|strong="H0622"\w* a \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w forces|strong="H2428"\w*: and \add one\add* shall \w certainly|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w overflow|strong="H7857"\w*, and pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w*: then shall he \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and be stirred \w up|strong="H1624"\w*, \add even\add* to his \w fortress|strong="H4581"\w*.\f + \fr 11.10 \ft shall be…: or, shall war\f*\f + \fr 11.10 \ft return…: or, be stirred up again\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* shall be moved with \w choler|strong="H4843"\w*, and shall come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with him, \add even\add* with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*: and he shall set \w forth|strong="H5975"\w* a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*; but the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* shall be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\add And\add* when he hath taken \w away|strong="H5375"\w* the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*, his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* shall be lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w*; and he shall cast \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \add many\add* ten \w thousands|strong="H7239"\w*: but he shall not be \w strengthened|strong="H5810"\w* \add by it\add*.

For the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and shall set \w forth|strong="H5975"\w* a \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* \w greater|strong="H7227"\w* than the \w former|strong="H7223"\w*, and shall \w certainly|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H7093"\w* \w certain|strong="H6256"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* and with \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w riches|strong="H7399"\w*.\f + \fr 11.13 \ft after…: Heb. at the end of times, even years\f*

And in those \w times|strong="H6256"\w* there shall \w many|strong="H7227"\w* stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w* against the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*: also the \w robbers|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w exalt|strong="H5375"\w* themselves to \w establish|strong="H5975"\w* the \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*; but they shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w*.\f + \fr 11.14 \ft the robbers: Heb. the children of robbers\f*

So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and cast \w up|strong="H8210"\w* a \w mount|strong="H5550"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3920"\w* the most \w fenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: and the \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* shall not \w withstand|strong="H5975"\w*, neither his \w chosen|strong="H4005"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, neither \add shall there be any\add* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* to \w withstand|strong="H5975"\w*.\f + \fr 11.15 \ft the most…: Heb. the city of munitions\f*\f + \fr 11.15 \ft his…: Heb. the people of his choices\f*

But he that \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* against him shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to his own \w will|strong="H7522"\w*, and none shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him: and he shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w glorious|strong="H6643"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which by his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall be \w consumed|strong="H3617"\w*.\f + \fr 11.16 \ft glorious…: or, goodly, etc.: Heb. land of ornament\f*

He shall also \w set|strong="H7760"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* with the \w strength|strong="H8633"\w* of his whole \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, and upright \w ones|strong="H3477"\w* with him; thus shall he \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: and he shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w corrupting|strong="H7843"\w* her: but she shall not \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \add on his side\add*, neither be for him.\f + \fr 11.17 \ft upright…: or, much uprightness: or, equal conditions\f*\f + \fr 11.17 \ft corrupting: Heb. to corrupt\f*

After this shall he \w turn|strong="H7760"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* unto the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w*, and shall \w take|strong="H3920"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*: but a \w prince|strong="H7101"\w* for his own behalf shall cause the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* offered by him to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*; \w without|strong="H1115"\w* his own \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* he shall cause \add it\add* to \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* upon him.\f + \fr 11.18 \ft for…: Heb. for him\f*\f + \fr 11.18 \ft the reproach…: Heb. his reproach\f*

Then he shall \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* toward the \w fort|strong="H4581"\w* of his own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: but he shall \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w* and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, and not be \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

Then shall stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w* in his \w estate|strong="H3653"\w* a \w raiser|strong="H5674"\w* of \w taxes|strong="H5065"\w* \add in\add* the \w glory|strong="H1925"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*: but within \w few|strong="H0259"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* he shall be \w destroyed|strong="H7665"\w*, neither in \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, nor in \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 11.20 \ft estate: or, place\f*\f + \fr 11.20 \ft a…: Heb. one that causeth an exacter to pass over\f*\f + \fr 11.20 \ft anger: Heb. angers\f*

And in his \w estate|strong="H3653"\w* shall stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w* a vile \w person|strong="H0959"\w*, to whom they shall not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w honour|strong="H1935"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*: but he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* in \w peaceably|strong="H7962"\w*, and \w obtain|strong="H2388"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* by \w flatteries|strong="H2519"\w*.\f + \fr 11.21 \ft estate: or, place\f*

And with the \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* of a \w flood|strong="H7858"\w* shall they be \w overflown|strong="H7857"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, and shall be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*; yea, also the \w prince|strong="H5057"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

And after the \w league|strong="H2266"\w* \add made\add* with him he shall \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w deceitfully|strong="H4820"\w*: for he shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and shall become \w strong|strong="H6105"\w* with a \w small|strong="H4592"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w*.

He shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w peaceably|strong="H7962"\w* even upon the fattest \w places|strong="H4924"\w* of the \w province|strong="H4082"\w*; and he shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add that\add* which his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have not \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, nor his \w fathers’|strong="H0001"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; he shall \w scatter|strong="H0967"\w* among them the \w prey|strong="H0961"\w*, and \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*, and \w riches|strong="H7399"\w*: \add yea\add*, and he shall \w forecast|strong="H2803"\w* his \w devices|strong="H4284"\w* against the strong \w holds|strong="H4013"\w*, even for a \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.\f + \fr 11.24 \ft peaceably…: or, into the peaceable and fat, etc\f*\f + \fr 11.24 \ft forecast…: Heb. think his thoughts\f*

And he shall stir \w up|strong="H5782"\w* his \w power|strong="H3581"\w* and his \w courage|strong="H3824"\w* against the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*; and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* shall be stirred \w up|strong="H1624"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* with a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w mighty|strong="H6099"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*; but he shall not \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*: for they shall \w forecast|strong="H2803"\w* \w devices|strong="H4284"\w* against him.

Yea, they that \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* of the portion of his \w meat|strong="H6598"\w* shall \w destroy|strong="H7665"\w* him, and his \w army|strong="H2428"\w* shall \w overflow|strong="H7857"\w*: and \w many|strong="H7227"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* down \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*.

And \w both|strong="H8147"\w* these \w kings’|strong="H4428"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \add shall be\add* to do \w mischief|strong="H4827"\w*, and they shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w* at \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*; but it shall not \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*: for yet the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \add shall be\add* at the time \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w*.\f + \fr 11.27 \ft hearts: Heb. their hearts\f*

Then shall he \w return|strong="H7725"\w* into his \w land|strong="H0776"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w riches|strong="H7399"\w*; and his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \add shall be\add* against the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*; and he shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add exploits\add*, and \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to his own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

At the time \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* he shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* toward the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*; but it shall not be as the \w former|strong="H7223"\w*, or as the \w latter|strong="H0314"\w*.

¶ For the \w ships|strong="H6716"\w* of \w Chittim|strong="H3794"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* against him: therefore he shall be \w grieved|strong="H3512"\w*, and \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and have \w indignation|strong="H2194"\w* against the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*: so shall he \w do|strong="H6213"\w*; he shall even \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and have \w intelligence|strong="H0995"\w* with them that \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

And \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* on his part, and they shall \w pollute|strong="H2490"\w* the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* of \w strength|strong="H4581"\w*, and shall take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w daily|strong="H8548"\w* \add sacrifice\add*, and they shall \w place|strong="H5414"\w* the \w abomination|strong="H8251"\w* that maketh \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*.\f + \fr 11.31 \ft maketh…: or, astonisheth\f*

And such as do \w wickedly|strong="H7561"\w* against the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* shall he \w corrupt|strong="H2610"\w* by \w flatteries|strong="H2514"\w*: but the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that do \w know|strong="H3045"\w* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add exploits\add*.\f + \fr 11.32 \ft corrupt: or, cause to dissemble\f*

And they that \w understand|strong="H7919"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w instruct|strong="H0995"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*: yet they shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and by \w flame|strong="H3852"\w*, by \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*, and by \w spoil|strong="H0961"\w*, \add many\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

Now when they shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w*, they shall be \w holpen|strong="H5826"\w* with a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w help|strong="H5828"\w*: but \w many|strong="H7227"\w* shall \w cleave|strong="H3867"\w* to them with \w flatteries|strong="H2519"\w*.

And \add some\add* of them of \w understanding|strong="H7919"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w*, to \w try|strong="H6884"\w* them, and to \w purge|strong="H1305"\w*, and to make \add them\add* \w white|strong="H3835"\w*, \add even\add* to the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the \w end|strong="H7093"\w*: because \add it is\add* yet for a time \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w*.\f + \fr 11.35 \ft try them: or, try by them\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to his \w will|strong="H7522"\w*; and he shall \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* himself, and \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* himself above every \w god|strong="H0410"\w*, and shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* marvellous \w things|strong="H6381"\w* against the \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of \w gods|strong="H0410"\w*, and shall \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w* till the \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w* be \w accomplished|strong="H3615"\w*: for that that is \w determined|strong="H2782"\w* shall be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

Neither shall he \w regard|strong="H0995"\w* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, nor the \w desire|strong="H2532"\w* of \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, nor \w regard|strong="H0995"\w* any \w god|strong="H0433"\w*: for he shall \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* himself above all.

But in his \w estate|strong="H3653"\w* shall he \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* the \w God|strong="H0433"\w* of \w forces|strong="H4581"\w*: and a \w god|strong="H0433"\w* whom his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not shall he \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and with \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and pleasant \w things|strong="H2532"\w*.\f + \fr 11.38 \ft in…: or, as for the Almighty God, in his seat he shall honour yea, he shall honour a god, whom, etc\f*\f + \fr 11.38 \ft estate: or, stead\f*\f + \fr 11.38 \ft forces: or, munitions: Heb. Mauzzim, or, God’s protectors\f*\f + \fr 11.38 \ft pleasant: Heb. things desired\f*

Thus shall he \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in the most \w strong|strong="H4581"\w* \w holds|strong="H4013"\w* with a \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w god|strong="H0433"\w*, whom he shall \w acknowledge|strong="H5234"\w* \add and\add* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* with \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: and he shall cause them to \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* over \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, and shall \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* for \w gain|strong="H4242"\w*.\f + \fr 11.39 \ft most…: Heb. fortresses of munitions\f*\f + \fr 11.39 \ft gain: Heb. a price\f*

And at the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* shall the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w push|strong="H5055"\w* at him: and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* shall come against him like a \w whirlwind|strong="H8175"\w*, with \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and with \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, and with \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w ships|strong="H0591"\w*; and he shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, and shall \w overflow|strong="H7857"\w* and pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w*.

He shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* also into the \w glorious|strong="H6643"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \add countries\add* shall be \w overthrown|strong="H3782"\w*: but these shall \w escape|strong="H4422"\w* out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \add even\add* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and the \w chief|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*.\f + \fr 11.41 \ft glorious…: or, goodly, etc.: Heb. land of delight, or, ornament\f*

He shall stretch \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* also upon the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*: and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall not \w escape|strong="H6413"\w*.\f + \fr 11.42 \ft stretch…: Heb. send forth\f*

But he shall have \w power|strong="H4910"\w* over the \w treasures|strong="H4362"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and over all the \w precious|strong="H2532"\w* things of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and the \w Libyans|strong="H3864"\w* and the \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* \add shall be\add* at his \w steps|strong="H4703"\w*.

But \w tidings|strong="H8052"\w* out of the \w east|strong="H4217"\w* and out of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* shall \w trouble|strong="H0926"\w* him: therefore he shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w*, and utterly to make \w away|strong="H2763"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*.

And he shall \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* the \w tabernacles|strong="H0168"\w* of his \w palace|strong="H0643"\w* between the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w* in the \w glorious|strong="H6643"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*; yet he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to his \w end|strong="H7093"\w*, and none shall \w help|strong="H5826"\w* him.\f + \fr 11.45 \ft glorious…: or, goodly, etc.: Heb. mountain of delight of holiness\f*
